title: [bug] [plugins] [v2] Creating a new plugin project comes with github workflows.

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

As the title says, when creating a new plugin project, GitHub workflows are also created. This should not be the default behavior. It should be up to the project owner to set these up if they wish to. The plugin folder should only contain the necessary files to build the plugin

### Reproduction

Create a new plugin project

### Expected behavior

_No response_
